titles.title: Commending the Valdosta State University Blazers on winning the NCAA Division II National Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 12/19/2007--Introduced. Commends the Valdosta State University Blazers for winning the NCAA Division II National Championship.
